content:
Matt Harvey said all the right things today. Apologizing to all. Good.
But talk is cheap. Actions speak louder than words.
Now show us Matt!
name: RUSS SALZBERG

content: Heartbreak. Deepest condolences to Chris Berman on the tragic loss of his wife Katherine. Sometimes bad things happen to good people. RIP.
name: RUSS SALZBERG

content: Ok Matt Harvey. This is it. First day of the rest of your baseball life. Talk is cheap. Play the game. Time now to show us what you've got.
name: RUSS SALZBERG
